name: A Basketball Perfect Shot Classic Arcade Free Throw by Skill Games Mobile
name_original: A Basketball Perfect Shot Classic Arcade Free Throw by Skill Games Mobile
description: Awesome classic arcade basketball! Download this classic game of hoops for FREE today. Take you skills to the free throw line and see how many baskets you can make! Multiple themes and modes! Make sure you slide and flick it hard enough. Too slow and you BRICK! Fun for all ages! Get it FREE and challenge your friends now!
